narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Peds to Go INC is a Registered Nurse  Infusion Therapy provider based in Orlando, FL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $106.5M in Medicaid payments across 162K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $106.5M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,315 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
